The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 May is 274,052 (31,586.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 April, there were 1,225 new confirmed cases (141.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 April, there were 2,019 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (794 fewer cases).
